channel.title: Deathstep 's podcast
channel.description: The Deathstep Organization presents Deathstep Radio featuring the hardest in new breakcore from artists such as 9MM, Spacebeer, Traits, The Indestructible Drop, Rotator, Jimmy S, Xrin Arms, Vagina Snot,and MANY MANY MORE. We also feature videos from the film crew known as UDNO (ultimate dude's night out). Enjoy our stupid crap and give some feedback!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Breakcore and idiotic "comedy"
channel.itunes:author: Deathstep Radio Deathstep Radio
channel.itunes:summary: The Deathstep Organization presents Deathstep Radio featuring the hardest in new breakcore from artists such as 9MM, Spacebeer, Traits, The Indestructible Drop, Rotator, Jimmy S, Xrin Arms, Vagina Snot,and MANY MANY MORE. We also feature videos from the film crew known as UDNO (ultimate dude's night out). Enjoy our stupid crap and give some feedback!

item.title: Car Stuff with Rick and Randy Roads!
item.description: This is golden. We topped ourselves with this one. Have you ever viewed a fix-it-up car show on tv? Imagine Tim "The Toolman" Taylor from down south minus the AR AR AR and theres two of them with a drunk shithead friend, Spit, cuz thats about all you can do with him. ENJOY!
item.dc:creator: Deathstep Radio Deathstep Radio

item.title: UDNO - Abducted! Bloopies
item.description: So this was intended to be some sort of comedy skit based on the weak premise of people being abducted. All that came of it was these bloopies. More laughing dipshits. We try.
item.dc:creator: Deathstep Radio Deathstep Radio

item.title: UDNO - Emotional Bloopies
item.description: these are good ol' bloopies from our "so emotional" borefest. more of us laughing like assholes

item.title: UDNO - UDNO Radio excerpt - MC AAADDD riffing
item.description: This is from a lovely UDNO with MC AAADDD, Spacebeer, World Class Yo-Yo'er Hank Freeman, Mikey the Studer, and Vagina Snot. Cousin Jon as MC AAADDD spit that fire that burns oh so sweet.
item.dc:creator: Deathstep Radio Deathstep Radio

item.title: UDNO- So emotional : A documentary on the life and times of post-youth in the outskirts of Mantua, Ohio
item.description: This is some of the most hardcore party footage ever. As seen on Extreme MTV, uberESPN, ESPN7:the/rage, and Ultimate Fun Rock in Japan.
item.dc:creator: Deathstep Radio Deathstep Radio
item.itunes:summary: This is some of the most hardcore party footage ever. As seen on Extreme MTV, uberESPN, ESPN7:the/rage, and Ultimate Fun Rock in Japan.

item.title: UDNO- Shin harvesters from Planet Gak!!!! Trailer
item.description: This is the trailer for SHIN HARVESTERS FROM PLANET GAK! UDNO rules. Featuring 9MM, Spacebeer, MC AAADDD, Studer, and 10L Rockwell.
item.dc:creator: Deathstep Radio Deathstep Radio
item.itunes:summary: This is the trailer for SHIN HARVESTERS FROM PLANET GAK! UDNO rules. Featuring 9MM, Spacebeer, MC AAADDD, Studer, and 10L Rockwell.

item.title: Deathstep Radio - First official show!
item.description: some chunks were cut due to extremely harsh bits of white noise that wanted to replace our signal when we recorded our show. BUT dont let that phase you- theres still a shitpot full of radio gold and some bronze and the HARDEST breakcore and grindcore your money cant buy from all kinds of assholes such as spacebeer, 9mm, traits, xrin arms, danny tanner, dj funk, paper paper paper etc, many more...and a special word from some representatives of the FREMPUM CORPORATION to tell us a little bit about their products and services....then its on to DR. LOVE for all your romantical questions and his usually self destructive suggestions. he's the coolest.
